item.title: Culture as practice drafting
item.description: Writing a section for a paper on research-evaluation, research-culture, research-lm How we evaluate As important as understanding “what” to evaluate (ie., interaction styles, reflection of culturally-embedded preferences) is the question of how to evaluate these diverse desiderata.
